original_title: XXV: The Enduring Vision of Albert Mohler at Southern Seminary
overview: Produced in celebration of the 25th Anniversary of Albert Mohler's presidency at The Southern Baptist Theological Seminary, this short film explores the conviction, vision, and mission of the man that led the charge in the transformation of the flagship seminary of the Southern Baptist Convention.
title: XXV: The Enduring Vision of Albert Mohler at Southern Seminary
